description: I. Letter dated 01/03/2010from Lord Mandelson to Andrew Dismore MP regarding online infringement of copyright provisions in the Digital Economy Bill. 3 p. II. Government response to Joint Committee on Human Rights (HL Paper 44; HC327). 9 p. III. Letter dated 01/03/2010 from Lord Young of Norwood Green to Peter Luff MP regarding the Digital Economy Bill and the Government response to Joint Committee on Human Rights. 1 p.
department: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
